entity.dynamic

Class DynamicSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Sprite
      • entity.dynamic.DynamicSprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyGround, EnemyWaterOctopus, EnemyWaterShark, Player, Projectile

    public abstract class DynamicSprite
extends Sprite

      • calculateCorners

        public void calculateCorners(double x,
